articles.title: Durand Cup 2023: East Bengal FC see off Gokulam Kerala FC to advance to semi-final - Indian Super League
articles.description: East Bengal FC booked their place in the semi-final of the Durand Cup 2023 with a hard-fought 2-1 win against Gokulam Kerala FC at the Vivekananda Yuba Bharati Krirangan, in Kolkata, on Friday.
